name: lesspass
description: LessPass node module used to generate LessPass passwords
author: Guillaume Vincent <guillaume@oslab.fr>

scripts.build: rimraf lib && babel index.js -d lib && browserify --standalone LessPass index.js > lib/lesspass.js
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run build && npm run test:node
scripts.test:node: npm run build && cd tests && babel-node --presets es2015 node.js && cd ..
scripts.test:browser: npm run build && karma start tests/karma.config.js
